trans-unit.source: Represents a class that manages the current instance of a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个类，管理的当前实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This class also provides the query interface over the current instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]此类还提供通过<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>的当前实例的查询接口

trans-unit.source: By using an instance of this class, you can make various queries on the StateMachineWorkflowInstance.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用此类的实例，你可以使 StateMachineWorkflowInstance 上的各种查询。

trans-unit.source: Typical queries that can be made are as follows: - Current state of the state machine.
trans-unit.target: 可以进行的典型查询如下所示:-当前状态机的状态。

trans-unit.source: - Possible transitions from the current state.
- History of transitions for the state machine instance.
trans-unit.target: -历史记录的状态机实例的转换。

trans-unit.source: - Enumeration of all the states in the state machine.
trans-unit.target: -在状态机中的所有状态的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"></xref> class.
The current workflow runtime.
The <xref:System.Guid> that indicates the instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
runtime is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: runtime为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: or instanceId is an empty .
Gets the currently executing <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
The current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
Gets the name of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
The name of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
Posts a message to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"></xref>.
The name of the workflow queue.
The object to queue.
Posts a message to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"></xref>.
The name of the workflow queue.
The object to queue.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"></xref> that allows the sender to be notified when the item is delivered.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"> </xref>允许发件人传递项时收到通知。

trans-unit.source: An object to be passed to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"></xref> methods.
Gets the <xref:System.Guid> that indicates the current instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Guid>，该值指示当前实例的<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> that indicates the current instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
Gets a collection of state transitions that the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> can make.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合的状态转换当前<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>可以进行。

trans-unit.source: A collection of state transitions that the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> can make.
trans-unit.target: 转换的状态的集合当前<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>可以进行。

trans-unit.source: Provides a transition to a specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> using the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供到指定的转换<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>使用的名称<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> to transition to.
targetStateName is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: targetStateName为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The specified by targetStateName is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: 指定的 targetStateName 为空引用 ()。

trans-unit.source: Provides a transition to a specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> to transition to.
targetState is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: targetState为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of state activities that the state machine workflow instance has transitioned through.
trans-unit.target: 获取状态机工作流实例已转换过的状态活动的集合。

trans-unit.source: This property only returns the state history if the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> is used.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅返回状态历史记录，如果<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>使用。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: An `InvalidOperationException` occurs if the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> is not installed.
If there is no state history for a newly created instance, state history is created without the instance being started.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有新创建的实例没有状态历史记录，正在启动实例的情况下会创建状态历史记录。

trans-unit.source: A collection of transitions that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> has made.
Gets the latest definition of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
This property only returns a copy of the workflow definition and never the live instance tree.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅返回一份工作流定义，而绝不会实时实例树。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the activity tree that is returned by this property cannot be used to query for run-time values.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不使用此属性返回的活动树查询运行时间值。

trans-unit.source: The latest definition of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
If the workflow has already completed, the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> cannot be retrieved, so the previous definition is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流已完成，当前<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>无法检索，以便检索以前的定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> classes in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>.
A list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> classes in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*> is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>为空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
The current <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
